title.narrative: Defining business strategy and improving financial sustainability

description.narrative:
Established on 2014, Baixing Cooperative is relatively young and on her startup phase. Due to the strong entrepreneurial mindset of board (also served as management), BC has a strong vision on business development. The actions of board are mainly on production and sales activities. It is understandable in the life-cycle of the cooperative. For the time being, the cash is king. Improving financial output and gaining more cash is of great importance, not only to the further development of the cooperative, but also to consolidate the trust from members as the owners of the cooperative.
Therefore, it is expected to make the cooperative bankable and learn the management how to make a sound business plan for future and improve financial transparency for the trust of members through various advising mission and training.
Project background: To gain social-economic impact by strengthening the share based membership, which is very rare in the local region and improving the income of smallholder farmers.Project objective: To support the young cooperative in defining her vision and business strategy, improving the organisation's financial sustainability. Funding: Jointly funded by Agriterra, local government and cooperative.Evaluation: The main KPIs are member shares increase, dividend rise per share, youth participation in the cooperative management, strategic and business plan in place.Cost efficiency: Apply cost-benefit analysis after the project period. Regular follow-up about the progress made by national Business Adviser.
The goals of this project are summarized as following:
Assessing the feasibility of building an agricultural demonstration base, supported by government funds.Defining business strategy and assist on how to make a sound business plan.Support in introducing filed-related technology from Dutch sector where there is a fit. Strengthening financial management capacity, including cash flow management, budgeting, financial transparency, etc.
